title: Warning alerts v2: Route alerts to correct manager based on account/opportunity ownership

sections.text: Fix warning alert routing so notifications are sent to the appropriate manager (and not only the deal owner or a default channel) based on the account/opportunity’s management hierarchy. Use CRM-derived owner/manager fields and define a deterministic fallback when manager data is missing or stale. Add lightweight logging for routed recipient and fallback reason to support troubleshooting without changing alert content.
